name: Word By Word
text: ٱقْتَرَبَتِ|Has come near|118|166|16324$ٱلسَّاعَةُ|the Hour|87|183|5525$وَٱنشَقَّ|and has split|104|200|16325$ٱلْقَمَرُ|the moon.|87|135|16326$

name: Word By Word
text: وَكَذَّبُواْ|And they denied|128|154|407$وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ|and followed|103|154|945$أَهْوَآءَهُمْ‌ۚ|their desires,|106|157|1116$وَكُلُّ|but (for) every|119|170|9354$أَمْرٍ|matter|64|90|5045$مُّسْتَقِرٌّ|(will be a) settlement.|167|167|16330$

name: Word By Word
text: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|114|640$جَآءَهُم|has come to them|140|153|853$مِّنَ|of|50|63|156$ٱلْأَنۢبَآءِ|the information|120|133|16331$مَا فِيهِ|wherein|78|91|16332$مُزْدَجَرٌ|(is) deterrence,|124|131|16333$

name: Word By Word
text: خُشَّعًا|(Will be) humbled|134|156|16337$أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ|their eyes|110|155|6424$يَخْرُجُونَ|they will come forth|152|197|16338$مِنَ|from|50|95|156$ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ|the graves|99|122|14509$كَأَنَّهُمْ|as if they (were)|132|230|944$جَرَادٌ|locusts|71|268|16339$مُّنتَشِرٌ|spreading,|88|186|16340$

name: Word By Word
text: ۞ كَذَّبَتْ|Denied|119|130|12122$قَبْلَهُمْ|before them|100|123|11274$قَوْمُ|(the) people|102|125|6840$نُوحٍ|(of) Nuh,|80|103|4641$فَكَذَّبُواْ|and they denied|127|150|14306$عَبْدَنَا|Our slave|82|94|14787$وَقَالُواْ|and said,|80|165|760$مَجْنُونٌ|`A madman,`|109|278|15581$وَٱزْدُجِرَ|and he was repelled.|157|242|16342$

name: Word By Word
text: فَفَتَحْنَآ|So We opened|116|137|16345$أَبْوَٲبَ|(the) gates|96|138|5590$ٱلسَّمَآءِ|(of) heaven|98|140|157$بِمَآءٍ|with water|91|132|10732$مُّنْهَمِرٍ|pouring down|108|129|16346$

name: Word By Word
text: وَفَجَّرْنَا|And We caused to burst|181|190|10761$ٱلْأَرْضَ|the earth|92|110|197$عُيُونًا|(with) springs,|116|134|16347$فَٱلْتَقَى|so met|78|96|16348$ٱلْمَآءُ|the water(s)|104|122|719$عَلَىٰٓ|for|63|72|52$أَمْرٍ|a matter|77|184|5045$قَدْ|already|68|282|1097$قُدِرَ|predestined.|102|209|16349$

name: Word By Word
text: وَحَمَلْنَـٰهُ|And We carried him|148|186|16350$عَلَىٰ|on|63|138|52$ذَاتِ أَلْوَٲحٍ|(ark) made of planks|156|231|16351$وَدُسُرٍ|and nails,|83|120|16352$

name: Word By Word
text: وَلَقَد|And certainly|107|142|640$تَّرَكْنَـٰهَآ|We left it|92|161|16354$ءَايَةً|(as) a Sign,|98|167|2339$فَهَلْ|so is (there)|102|171|6409$مِن|any|50|84|53$مُّدَّكِرٍ|who will receive admonition?|208|208|16355$

name: Word By Word
text: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|115|640$يَسَّرْنَا|We have made easy|154|170|16357$ٱلْقُرْءَانَ|the Quran|95|111|4239$لِلذِّكْرِ|for remembrance,|136|152|16358$فَهَلْ|so is (there)|102|118|6409$مِن|any|50|58|53$مُّدَّكِرٍ|who will receive admonition?|208|208|16355$

name: Word By Word
text: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly,|112|120|640$يَسَّرْنَا|We have made easy|154|169|16357$ٱلْقُرْءَانَ|the Quran|95|110|4239$لِلذِّكْرِ|for remembrance,|136|151|16358$فَهَلْ|so is (there)|102|117|6409$مِن|any|50|58|53$مُّدَّكِرٍ|who will receive admonition?|208|208|16355$

name: Word By Word
text: فَقَالُوٓاْ|And said,|81|95|4596$أَبَشَرًا|`Is (it) a human being|167|194|16366$مِّنَّا|among us|83|110|1169$وَٲحِدًا|one,|76|104|1223$نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ|(that) we should follow him?|208|222|16367$إِنَّآ|Indeed, we|94|120|120$إِذًا|then|50|102|1317$لَّفِى|(will be) surely in|133|186|1513$ضَلَـٰلٍ|error|77|130|3468$وَسُعُرٍ|and madness.|111|137|16368$

name: Word By Word
text: سَيَعْلَمُونَ|They will know|117|142|16371$غَدًا|tomorrow|82|131|8844$مَّنِ|who|50|99|1673$ٱلْكَذَّابُ|(is) the liar,|98|147|16372$ٱلْأَشِرُ|the insolent one.|132|156|16373$

name: Word By Word
text: إِنَّا|Indeed, We|96|108|120$مُرْسِلُواْ|(are) sending|108|131|16374$ٱلنَّاقَةِ|the she-camel|115|138|16375$فِتْنَةً|(as) a trial|90|113|7216$لَّهُمْ|for them,|81|104|98$فَٱرْتَقِبْهُمْ|so watch them|119|131|16376$وَٱصْطَبِرْ|and be patient.|122|122|11256$

name: Word By Word
text: فَنَادَوْاْ|But they called|120|155|14759$صَاحِبَهُمْ|their companion|125|194|16379$فَتَعَاطَىٰ|and he took|99|168|16380$فَعَقَرَ|and hamstrung.|123|158|16381$

name: Word By Word
text: إِنَّآ|Indeed, We|96|107|120$أَرْسَلْنَا|[We] sent|87|109|1342$عَلَيْهِمْ|upon them|90|112|22$صَيْحَةً|thunderous blast|131|153|14475$وَٲحِدَةً|single,|78|100|1853$فَكَانُواْ|and they became|135|146|9833$كَهَشِيمِ|like dry twig fragments|171|327|16382$ٱلْمُحْتَظِرِ|(used by) a fence builder.|192|348|16383$

name: Word By Word
text: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|115|640$يَسَّرْنَا|We have made easy|154|170|16357$ٱلْقُرْءَانَ|the Quran|95|111|4239$لِلذِّكْرِ|for remembrance,|136|152|16358$فَهَلْ|so is (there)|102|118|6409$مِن|any|50|58|53$مُّدَّكِرٍ|who will receive admonition?|208|208|16355$

name: Word By Word
text: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|115|640$أَنذَرَهُم|he warned them|127|143|16386$بَطْشَتَنَا|(of) Our seizure,|129|145|16387$فَتَمَارَوْاْ|but they disputed|138|154|16388$بِٱلنُّذُرِ|the warnings.|110|118|16365$

name: Word By Word
text: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|124|640$رَٲوَدُوهُ عَن|they demanded from him|183|218|16389$ضَيْفِهِۦ|his guests,|92|127|16390$فَطَمَسْنَآ|so We blinded|112|147|16391$أَعْيُنَهُمْ|their eyes.|91|108|5188$فَذُوقُواْ|`So taste|85|167|3154$عَذَابِى|My punishment|119|282|6900$وَنُذُرِ|and My warnings.`|144|226|16356$

name: Word By Word
text: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|115|640$يَسَّرْنَا|We have made easy|154|170|16357$ٱلْقُرْءَانَ|the Quran|95|111|4239$لِلذِّكْرِ|for remembrance,|136|152|16358$فَهَلْ|so is (there)|102|118|6409$مِن|any|50|58|53$مُّدَّكِرٍ|who will receive admonition?|208|208|16355$

name: Word By Word
text: كَذَّبُواْ|They denied|101|122|2650$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِنَا|Our Signs,|88|131|408$كُلِّهَا|all of them,|95|138|16393$فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُمْ|so We seized them|145|188|5581$أَخْذَ|(with) a seizure|124|146|16394$عَزِيزٍ|(of) All-Mighty,|121|322|16395$مُّقْتَدِرٍ|(the) Powerful One.|151|352|16396$

name: Word By Word
text: سَيُهْزَمُ|Soon will be defeated|163|185|16401$ٱلْجَمْعُ|(their) assembly,|132|177|16402$وَيُوَلُّونَ|and they will turn|136|181|16403$ٱلدُّبُرَ|(their) backs.|110|132|16404$

name: Word By Word
text: بَلِ|Nay,|50|67|3361$ٱلسَّاعَةُ|the Hour|87|120|5525$مَوْعِدُهُمْ|(is) their promised time,|178|212|16405$وَٱلسَّاعَةُ|and the Hour|106|140|15665$أَدْهَىٰ|(will be) more grievous|170|187|16406$وَأَمَرُّ|and more bitter.|127|127|16407$

name: Word By Word
text: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|139|640$أَهْلَكْنَآ|We destroyed|112|176|5422$أَشْيَاعَكُمْ|your kinds,|100|164|16411$فَهَلْ|so is (there)|102|166|6409$مِن|any|50|82|53$مُّدَّكِرٍ|who will receive admonition?|208|208|16355$
